name: SingleConsumerSample
description: only consumes a single price at a time. this is just an example of how to consume the oracle data with no full use case built inplease get creative and think of stuff to build on top ;).

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkCancelled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the Updater is slashed (should be paired with ImproperUpdater or DoubleUpdate event).

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkFulfilled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the Updater is slashed (should be paired with ImproperUpdater or DoubleUpdate event).

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkRequested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the Updater is slashed (should be paired with ImproperUpdater or DoubleUpdate event).

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the Updater is slashed (should be paired with ImproperUpdater or DoubleUpdate event).

parameterDecorators.name: reporter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity that reported the updater misbehavior.

functionDecorators.name: configureOracle
functionDecorators.description: changes the variables that state which oracle and which job to call as well how much to pay.

parameterDecorators.name: _operator
parameterDecorators.description: the oracle that is called in "requestNFTvalue".

parameterDecorators.name: _jobId
parameterDecorators.description: the specific job that should be run.

parameterDecorators.name: _payment
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of link to pay for the job (18 decimals).

functionDecorators.name: fulfillRequest
functionDecorators.description: this function is called by the oracle shortly after the request was made.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: lets this contract know which request is being fulfilled.

parameterDecorators.name: _price
parameterDecorators.description: returns the price in USD, if _price == 4000 => the land is valuated at 4000 USD.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: requestNFTvalue
functionDecorators.description: requests a single valuation for a Sandbox Land ID from the Oracleit doesnt directly return the valuation. there will be another job for requesting a lot of IDs at once for massive gas savings.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: specifies the NFT ID that gets requested from the oracle.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
